Hero.title: Karim Feki
Hero.subtitle: <accent>Software</accent> Developer
Hero.description: Software development student, passionate about computer science and aeronautics, I put my skills at the service of innovative solutions.

About.heading: About
About.title: Who am I ?
description: Software development student, I enjoy learning and exploring different technologies to create modern and efficient applications. My journey has allowed me to develop solid skills in this field.
Inspired by aeronautics, I appreciate rigor and precision in my work. I am always looking to improve and discover new technical approaches.
Currently looking for an apprenticeship in Full-Stack development for September 2025, I am ready to take on new challenges and contribute to ambitious projects.

items.title: Internship - Web Developer
items.description: Maintenance and updates of OliveSoft's WordPress site. Improved user experience by redesigning the footer and integrating WP Google Maps. Managed MySQL databases via phpMyAdmin, contributed to performance optimization, and used Git for version control. Applied Agile/SCRUM methodologies using JIRA and Confluence.

items.title: Bachelor - Software Developer
items.description: A 3-year career-oriented program focused on web, mobile, and software application development. Skills gained in front-end, back-end, databases, software architecture, DevOps, and project management. Project-based learning with a work-study format starting in the third year.

items.title: Internship - Web Designer
items.description: Designed and temporarily hosted an e-commerce WordPress website dedicated to selling artwork. Created mockups with Figma, migrated sites from Wix to WordPress, and organized tasks using JIRA. Provided post-launch technical support.

items.title: General Baccalaureate
items.description: Earned the French General Baccalaureate with specializations in Computer Science (NSI) and Economics (SES).

Projects.heading: Projects
Projects.description: Discover a selection of my recent projects, showcasing my skills and expertise.

items.title: KovoitGO
items.description: Real-time carpooling application. Users can offer or book rides through a smooth and responsive interface. Backend built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, server-side rendering using EJS. This project ensures seamless user experience.

items.title: Fils Rouge PHP - EFREI Hackathon
items.description: Web application developed as a team during a hackathon. Authentication, CRUD operations, and user management with PHP and PostgreSQL. This project was built in a short timeframe, with strong collaboration among team members.

items.title: O.C.A Voitures
items.description: E-commerce platform developed with Symfony for selling and renting cars. Includes user management, cart, payments, transaction history, and secure authentication. The site offers a clean interface for navigation.

Contact.heading: Contact
Contact.paragraph: Do you have a project in mind or an opportunity to discuss? Don't hesitate to contact me!
Contact.name: Name
Contact.successDesc: Thank you for your message. I will reply as soon as possible.
